column1: Shiseido The Makeup Lifting Foundation SPF 15 PA ++ - I 60 Natural Deep Ivory  30 ml
column4: Meaning of the company name Shiseido: Ã¢ÂÂPraise the virtues of the great Earth  which nurtures new life and brings forth new valuesÃ¢ÂÂ. Having started out as a pharmacy  it wasnÃ¢ÂÂt until 1915 that Shiseido changed direction and committed to the cosmetics industry. The move was masterminded by Shinzo Fukuhara  the third son of Arinobu Fukuhara and the companyÃ¢ÂÂs first president. It was pioneer in introducing cosmetics  makeup or hair care products in the Japanese Market  as the first Japanese toothpaste  the first rice powders for the face with natural colours or the first cosmetic: Eudermine  a lotion that we still have today  although not available in Spain. Since then  Shiseido continued to grow& innovate  using the latest technology in order to get the best products. High importance is given to research  making each product be the result of a very detailed study and lead to a cosmetic discovery. Today  it is the first Japanese cosmetic group-leader in the Asian market and the 4th largest in the world  having presence in 84 countries  15 factories and 12 research centres all over the world  which employ more than 1000 researchers. Important beauty & cosmetics brands such as Carita or Decleor or perfumes as Issey Miyake  Jean Paul Gaultier or Narciso Rodriguez also belong to the Shiseido Group. Hard work has its own rewards  so Shiseido is one of the companies in the beauty sector awarded with the best prizes: IFSCC (International Federation of Societies of Cosmetic Chemists)  considered the Ã¢ÂÂNobelsÃ¢ÂÂ of cosmetics or the prize for being one of the most ethic companies in the whole world. Throughout its history  Shiseido has achieved a perfect balance between East and West  tradition and innovation to help promote and care for the beauty of women  keeping the balance between body and spirit.
